A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
My Episode VIII brief review: an irreverent\, emasculating\, demythologizing\, ultra-Disneyfied\, late-modern-centric Star Wars film that had stunning\, beautiful cinematography\, wonderful music by John Williams\, but would have been better as a SW side-story film. Basic takeaway lesson: You don't need parents\, books\, or master-teachers to be powerful\, you just have to be a self-assertive woman. This redefined and demythologized the force into self-centered-assertion.

I'm done with Star Wars after Episode VII! Yoda torched the Jedi Tree of Life and good wisdom books!!!!! Really???? 

Help us\, J.J. you're our only hope!
